attributes.action: Make the North East Combined Authority give the people a vote on Devolution
attributes.additional_details:
SUNDERLAND COUNCIL LEADER PAUL WATSON HAS TOLD THE NEWCASTLE CHRONICLE WE THE PUBLIC DON’T WANT A VOTE ON DEVOLUTION

HE SEEMS TO HAVE FORGOTTEN WE HAVE ALREADY VOTED ON DEVOLUTION IN 2004 AND IT WAS A MASSIVE MAJORITY TO REJECT DEVOLUTION
▼More details

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk_politics/3984387.stm

http://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/news/north-east-news/no-referendum-north-east-devolution-11802138
attributes.background: SUNDERLAND COUNCIL LEADER PAUL WATSON HAS TOLD THE NEWCASTLE CHRONICLE WE THE PUBLIC DON’T WANT A VOTE ON DEVOLUTION

rejection.details: The open petition which is similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165946
